description: A dashboard to display data exported by NUT UPS

targets.query:
from(bucket: "NUT-ups-Eaton")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ups_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups.status")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","driver.version","driver.version.data"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "NUT-ups-Eaton")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ups_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups.type")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "NUT-ups-Eaton")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ups_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ups.realpower.nominal" or r["_field"] == "ups.power.nominal")
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "NUT-ups-Eaton")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ups_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "battery.capacity")
  |> drop(columns: ["host","driver.version","driver.version.data"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
